creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: 14 3/8 × 9 5/8 in. (36.5 × 24.5 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban) each sheet
inscription: Characters' names written aside the figures, right: {Asakura Tōgo no tsuma} | left: {Orikoshi Daishō}
markings: censor seals: 浜 Hama, 馬込 Magome; publisher's seal: {Ryōgoku Jōshūya}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Higashiyama sakura zōshi 東山桜荘子, performed at the Nakamura Theater in the 8th lunar month 1851.
title: Actors Ichikawa Kodanji IV as the Ghost (Rei) of Asakura Tōgo (R) and Bandō Hikosaburō IV as Orikoshi Tairyō (L)
